sentence.Network_en: We are a stiff - necked people and a people of long memory.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们是个倔强的民族,一个善于记忆的民族.

sentence.Network_en: Yes, she was hardhearted , stiff - necked , and hard to bend, this Elizabeth whom he had married.
sentence.Network_cn: 是的, 这个同他结婚的伊丽沙白,是个冷酷无情 、 顽固不化, 难于屈从的女人.

sentence.Network_en: Mixed with its stiff - necked pride is a pervasive victim mentality.
sentence.Network_cn: 伴随这种顽固自豪的是深入人心的受害者心态.

entry.tran: 傲慢而顽固的;倔强的;犟的
entry.def: If you say that someone is stiff-necked, you mean that they are proud and unwilling to do what other people want.
